forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 20C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High around 70F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 65F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 65F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 16C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Windy with showers continuing in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 50F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
